playstation.title: Slow disk drive
playstation.description: The disk drive on your console is slow when accepting disks, requiring repair or replacement

playstation.title: Not reading disks
playstation.description: Your console is not reading disks and will therefore require repair or replacement of the disk drive.

playstation.title: Software fault
playstation.description: There is a fault with the software on your console which has prevented the completion of testing such as loading a game and will require repairs.

playstation.title: No power up
playstation.description: Your device is faulty and does not power on, requiring repairs.

playstation.title: No power up (Blue Light of Death)
playstation.description: Your device is faulty and does not completely power up, featuring a ''Blue Light of Death'' which suggests a critical hardware fault with your console and will repairs.

playstation.title: No display
playstation.description: Your device is faulty and does not output to a display despite signs of powering and will require repairs.

playstation.title: Controller fault
playstation.description: The provided controller is faulty with (INSERT FAULT HERE) and will require repair or replacement for resale.

playstation.title: No controller
playstation.description: No controller was provided, which will need to be replaced for resale.

playstation.title: No power cable
playstation.description: There was no power cable provided with the console, which will need to be replaced for resale.

xbox.title: Slow disk drive
xbox.description: The disk drive on your console is slow when accepting disks, requiring repair or replacement

xbox.title: Not reading disks

laptop.title: White pressure marks
laptop.description: There are white pressure marks on the display, requiring a screen replacement.

laptop.title: Heavily worn keyboard
laptop.description: The keyboard is heavily worn, decreasing the resale value of the device.

laptop.title: Heavily worn trackpad
laptop.description: The trackpad is heavily worn, decreasing the resale value of the device.

laptop.title: Heavily worn palm rest
laptop.description: The palm rest is heavily worn, decreasing the resale value of the device.

laptop.title: Heavy scratches to casing
laptop.description: There are multiple heavy scratches on the casing, decreasing the resale value of the device.

laptop.title: Missing key
laptop.description: There are one or more missing keys on the keyboard, requiring repair or replacement/

laptop.title: Excessive key wear
laptop.description: One or more of the keys on the keyboard are excessively worn, with the silkscreen lettering being worn away, requiring repair or replacement of the keyboard.

laptop.title: Loud fan
laptop.description: The fan is very loud during normal operation of the device, a sign of potential overheating issues, requiring servicing of the device.

laptop.title: Whining fan
laptop.description: The fan emits a whining noise which is a warning sign of total fan failure in the near future and will need to be replaced.

laptop.title: Overheating
laptop.description: The device overheated during our testing and will require servicing.

laptop.title: No display
laptop.description: Your device is faulty and does not output to the display, requiring repairs.

laptop.title: Battery fault
laptop.description: The battery on your device is faulty and does not hold a charge, requiring replacement.

laptop.title: No power up
laptop.description: Your device is faulty and does not power on, requiring repairs.
